iaik.asn1

Class CountingDerInputStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.InputStream
      • iaik.asn1.DerInputStream
        • iaik.asn1.CountingDerInputStream
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class CountingDerInputStream
extends DerInputStream
    Extends class DerInputStream to count the number of bytes read from the stream. This class is not thread safe, and counts with a signed 32 bit integer, so the counter will overflow after a maximum of 2,147,483,647 (inclusive) read bytes.

    • Field Summary

      • CountingDerInputStream

        public CountingDerInputStream(java.io.InputStream is)
        Creates a new DerInputStream to read data from the specified input stream. The given input stream supplies DER/BER encoded data.
        Parameters:
        is - the InputStream supplying DER/BER encoded data

      • read

        public int read(boolean unread)
         throws java.io.IOException
        Reads one byte from this InputStream. If the length encoding of this InputStream is indefinite no length checking is performed. If unread is set to true, the byte is pushed back again.
        Overrides:
        read in class DerInputStream
        Parameters:
        unread - true if the byte shall be unread
        Returns:
        the next byte from this InputStream
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O or a DER decoding error occurs

      • read

        public int read(byte[] b,
       int off,
       int len)
         throws java.io.IOException
        Reads bytes into a portion of an array. If the length encoding of this InputStream is indefinite no length checking is performed.
        Overrides:
        read in class DerInputStream
        Parameters:
        b - the byte array to which the data shall be read
        off - the start offset of the data
        len - the maximum number of bytes to be read
        Returns:
        the number of bytes actually read, or -1 if no more bytes can be read because the end of the stream already has been reached
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs
